div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

br.p: The Westview School Corporation recognizes the need for all students to receive an education that stresses the fundamental tools of learning and that maximizes individual potential. The corporation pledges to provide such programs as well as experiences emphasizing social, physical, emotional, and vocational well-being. We are committed to the enhancement of self-respect and respect for others, to high performance standards, and to personal responsibility.
Click here to view our story. Understand our pride.
Download our Westview App on Google Play or iOS App Store
